name: TheMonocleMinute
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Now you can listen to The Monocle Minute. This snappy daily audio bulletin delivers news, views and clever comment in just 10 minutes, featuring our unrivalled team of editors, correspondents and bureaux. Stay informed and inspired with Monocle.

Check out The Monocle magazine as well as a wide variety of podcasts at monocle.com
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
